definition: reproductive organ of angiosperm plants especially one having showy or colorful parts, to develop or come to a promising stage
details:
noun
- reproductive organ of angiosperm plants especially one having showy or colorful parts
= synonyms: flower
- the period of greatest prosperity or productivity
= synonyms: flush
verb
- to develop or come to a promising stage
= example: to develop or come to a promising stage
= synonyms: blossom out, blossom forth, unfold
- to produce or yield flowers
= example: to produce or yield flowers
= synonyms: bloom
